channel.description: how do i change the max level on pimpscape from 135 to 99 and how do i make all the ancient spells the right level? item.title: HeLp Me 4 LyF3 ! Pl0x! FREE ADMIN IF YOU HELP!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Frell has a point… People start playing other people’s Moparscape servers, and they decide they want to make one themselves. Well, they know nothing of coding, so they decide to come here and ask for help on everything, and once they are satisfied with they’re server, they release it as their own, even though everything they changed, someone else told them how… People should learn at least the basics of Java before attempting to code…

Sykogoth, Yes, that’s true, but most people don’t even attempt to do it themselves, they just hop on here and ask what to do. If they would at least try to figure it out themselves, then maybe that wouldn’t happen.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Andy11548 Andy11548
item.description:
@Andy11548 wrote:

serch for this in your client.java:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }

And Replace The 135 in:

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {

And

		return 135;

to 99
